item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Monday, October 7, 2024 at 3:15 PM UTC
item.description:
1. Can You Get Root with Only a Cigarette Lighter? (149 points | 35 comments)
2. Silicon Valley, the New Lobbying Monster (42 points | 19 comments)
3. Show HN: Visualization of website accessibility tree (153 points | 10 comments)
4. Abacus Machines [pdf] (12 points | discuss)
5. What's New in Ruby on Rails 8 (11 points | discuss)
6. Show HN: ServerlessAI – Build, scale, and monetize AI apps without back end (33 points | 9 comments)
7. Show HN: I built a Iridium/LTE satellite GPS tracker and took it to the Arctic (101 points | 4 comments)
8. Sq.io: jq for databases and more (512 points | 102 comments)
9. Homemade AI Drone Software Finds People When Search and Rescue Teams Can't (26 points | 10 comments)
10. NASA Made the Hubble Telescope to Be Remade (25 points | 5 comments)
11. PermitFlow (YC W22) Is Hiring Senior/Staff Engineers in NYC ( | hide)
12. How do HTTP servers figure out Content-Length? (181 points | 79 comments)
13. Hetzner Object Storage (181 points | 110 comments)
14. AT&T, Verizon reportedly hacked to target US govt wiretapping platform (13 points | 2 comments)
15. The Rise of Worse Is Better (43 points | 43 comments)
16. We'll buy back your Typewriter for Uncle Sam (88 points | 27 comments)
17. Fast B-Trees (187 points | 40 comments)
18. The Nobel Prize in Physiology or Medicine 2024 (118 points | 40 comments)
19. Photos of an e-waste dumping ground (152 points | 84 comments)
20. Ants learned to farm fungi during a mass extinction (183 points | 49 comments)
21. The Book of Kells, now digitized and available online (380 points | 96 comments)
22. New Italian Law Threatens ISPs with Prison over Piracy Reporting Failures (42 points | 16 comments)
23. AVX Bitwise ternary logic instruction busted (290 points | 60 comments)
24. Show HN: I have published a mobile HN client to have coffee chat with HN users (43 points | 11 comments)
25. Python 3.13.0 Is Released (78 points | 23 comments)
26. Show HN: Instant HTML Preview Bookmarklet (102 points | 29 comments)
27. Congress fights to keep AM radio in cars (259 points | 478 comments)
28. Show HN: Offline audiobook from any format with one CLI command (65 points | 22 comments)
29. A Seven-Dimensional Analysis of Hashing Methods [pdf] (2015) (18 points | 1 comment)
30. ByteDance’s Bytespider is scraping at much higher rates than other platforms (107 points | 80 comments)
